display.value: Patient and Carers Concerns Expectations and Wishes

definition.value: Description of the concerns, wishes or goals of the person as expressed by the person, their representative or carer (sometimes known as advance statements). Where the person lacks capacity this may include their representatives concerns, expectations or wishes. Description of the concerns, wishes or goals of the person as expressed by the person, their representative or carer (sometimes known as advance statements).

Written requests and preferences made by a person with capacity conveying their wishes, beliefs and values for their future care should they lose capacity. Include the location of the document if known.
